32 class FftProcessorImpl {
33  public:
34  FftProcessorImpl( uint16_t aBandCount );
35  virtual ~FftProcessorImpl() {}
36  virtual std::shared_ptr<float> process( const float * inBuffer ) = 0;
37  uint16_t getBandCount() const { return mBandCount; }
38  protected:
39  uint16_t mBandCount;
40 };

42 typedef std::shared_ptr<class FftProcessor> FftProcessorRef;
43 
44 class FftProcessor {
45  public:
46  static const uint16_t DEFAULT_BAND_COUNT = 512;
47 
48  static FftProcessorRef createRef( uint16_t aBandCount = DEFAULT_BAND_COUNT );
49 
50  std::shared_ptr<float> process( const float * inBuffer ) { return mImpl->process( inBuffer ); }
51  uint16_t getBandCount() const { return mImpl->getBandCount(); }
52  private:
53  FftProcessor( uint16_t aBandCount );
54  std::shared_ptr<FftProcessorImpl> mImpl;
55 };
